CREATION : [1.000000 + 2.000000X^1 + 3.000000X^2 + 2.123000X^5]

CREATION : [1.000000 + 10.000000X^2 + 3.500000X^3]

CREATION : [1.000000 + 2.880000X^2]

ADDITION : [1.000000 + 1.000000X^1 + 1.000000X^4 + 1.000000X^6 + 1.000000X^8] + [3.000000 + 4.500000X^1 + 6.000000X^3 + 3.170000X^6] = [4.000000 + 5.500000X^1 + 6.000000X^3 + 1.000000X^4 + 4.170000X^6 + 1.000000X^8]

PRODUIT : [1.000000 + 1.000000X^1 + 0.500000X^3] x [7.000000 + 2.000000X^2 + 2.000000X^5] = [7.000000 + 7.000000X^1 + 2.000000X^2 + 5.500000X^3 + 3.000000X^5 + 2.000000X^6 + 1.000000X^8]

INTEGRATION : int√©grale sur [2.000000, 5.000000] de 1.000000X^2 + 5.775080X^6] = 0.000178
